doc.field: Oper shr 26 cts vs 18 cts Oper net 2,877,000 vs 1,363,000 Revs 44.3 mln vs 40.8 mln Avg shrs 10.9 mln vs 10.5 mln NOTE: prior qtr excludes loss 475,000, or five cts per share, for discontinued operations for the sale of subsidiaries Intermedics Intraocular Inc, Electronics Inc, and Intermedics Infusaid Inc.
